data.name: ktxAccounts_CookiesBlockedFooter
data.value: Click here to view our privacy policy and see how we use cookies

data.name: ktxAccounts_PasswordResetEmailSentText
data.value: We’ll send you an email in a moment to reset your password securely. Once you receive the email, please click the “Reset Password” button within the next 24 hours to reset your password.

data.name: ktxAccounts_PasswordResetErrorOccurred
data.value: An Error occured. Please try again later

data.name: ktxt_AccountsResetEmailNotSent
data.value: Reset password email sent failed. Please try agian later.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_AuthResponseCode_202
data.value: Please provide a valid email address to complete the login.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_AuthResponseCode_400
data.value: Sorry, please check your details and try again.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_AuthResponseCode_401
data.value: Email and password don't match. Try again or register with Skyscanner.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_AuthResponseCode_403
data.value: You haven't confirmed your email. Check your inbox and click on the link to confirm.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_AuthResponseCode_409
data.value: You have already registered with Skyscanner. Access your account by logging in.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_AuthResponseCode_ErrorCancel
data.value: Please ensure you complete the social login or register directly with Skyscanner.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_AuthResponseCode_ErrorDefault
data.value: Sorry, we appear to have a problem logging you in. Please try again in a moment.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_AuthResponseCode_IpBlocked403
data.value: You entered incorrect details too many times. Try again in 5 minutes or reset your password.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_AuthResponseCode_Social401
data.value: There is a problem connecting to your social account. Try again or register directly with Skyscanner.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_ChangeEmailErrorOccurred
data.value: Unable to change your email. Please try again later.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_ChangeEmailUserAlreadyExists
data.value: Another user already exists with that email address.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_ChangePasswordErrorOccurred
data.value: Unable to change your password. Please try again later.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_ChangePasswordInvalidPassword
data.value: The password entered is not recognised. Please provide your existing password.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_CookiesBlockedMessage
data.value: Please check your browser’s cookie settings and ensure BOTH cookies and third-party cookies are enabled. Skyscanner uses cookies for a separate authentication server to keep your account details safe and secured and to enhance your experience with our services.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_EmailConfirmationActivationFailedTitle
data.value: We were unable to activate your account

data.name: ktxtAccounts_EmailConfirmationInvalidTokenTitle
data.value: Your link is invalid or has expired, please try to register again.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_EmailConfirmationWelcomeText
data.value: Start the journey by logging in with your email and password below.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_FootnoteText
data.value: Just in case you cannot find our email in your inbox, please check the spam filter and add "@mailer.skyscanner.net" as a safe sender to receive our emails.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_LoginForgottenPasswordTitle
data.value: To reset your password, please enter your email address below:

data.value: Log in with your Skyscanner account

data.value: Log in with Skyscanner to save more of your Recent Searches. You can connect with your email and password or your Facebook account, so it's fast and simple.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_ManageTutorialText
data.value: You can change your email and password settings in the account management area.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_PasswordRegisterPrompt
data.value: Minimum 8 characters, and not your email account name

data.name: ktxtAccounts_PasswordResetInvalidEmail
data.value: The Email entered is not recognised. Try again.

I acknowledge that I was made aware of the general information about AIG and the Travel Insurance and I agree with the @@tag1@@travel insurance terms and conditions@@tag2@@ and @@tag3@@@@underwriter@@'s pivacy Policy@@tag4@@

data.value: Sorry, there are no optional extras available for this flight.

data.name: ktxtBooking_TicketInsuranceDescription
data.value: Airline ticket guarantee reimburses your ticket if an airline goes bankrupt up to the value of @@price@@ per ticket.

data.name: ktxtBooking_TravelInsuranceDescription
data.value: Single Trip Insurance will cover any losses arising as a result of events that occur before or during a trip including: emergency medical expenses, theft or loss of baggage and cancellation.

data.value: Thanks for booking your flight with @@ProviderName@@ via Skyscanner.

data.name: ktxtBooking_NeedAssistanceMessage
data.value: If you have any questions about your booking contact the @@ProviderName@@ service team at @@ProviderNameEmailLink@@ or call: @@tag@@ @@ProviderContactNumber@@ @@tag@@

data.name: ktxtBooking_CheckYourInbox
data.value: Check your inbox, you will receive your confirmation and invoice via email soon.

data.name: ktxtBooking_ReceivingYourEticket
data.value: Your eTicket will then be sent in a separate email. Please note it can take up to 24 hours to receive your eTicket.

data.name: ktxtAnon_AnonLoginNoEmail
data.value: You’re logged in anonymously so we don’t have your email address.

data.name: ktxtAnon_AnonLoginNothingToDo
data.value: So there’s nothing to do here.

data.name: ktxtAnon_AnonSocialNet
data.value: With anonymous log in you can enjoy most of what Skyscanner has to offer without providing your email address. You can upgrade to full Facebook log in later.

data.name: ktxtAnon_FullSocialNet
data.value: Enjoy all Skyscanner features without creating a new account and password. All we need from your social network is your email.

data.name: ktxtAnon_LogoutGoFull
data.value: To receive these Price Alerts by email log out and switch to logging in with Facebook.

data.name: ktxtBooking_BookingProcessInfoMessage
data.value: Skyscanner will complete the booking process by sending your information to @@ProviderName@@. Upon the successful completion of your booking, you will receive a confirmation email. Please direct any questions about your booking to @@ProviderName@@.

data.name: ktxtUserAccount_SubscriptionsSuggestionsHotels
data.value: Timely @@companyName@@ hotel recommendations based on your Recent Searches
data.comment: Changed this as the statement was incorrect. It's Recent Searches and not Price Alerts. Price Alerts resource is ktxtPriceAlerts_PriceAlertsHeader. Recent Searches resource is ktxtTripPlanning_RecentSearchesTitle (scaffold).

data.name: ktxtAccounts_DeletedSob
data.value: We hope to see you soon...sob...
data.comment: "Sob" may not translate very well in other languages. If this does not make sense then please translate without and end with a full stop.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_DeletedSummary
data.value: Your account has been deleted which means you won't hear from us unless you register again.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_DeleteReasonHeader
data.value: Did we do something wrong? Before you go, we'd love to know why you're leaving us (optional).

data.name: ktxtAccounts_DeleteReminder
data.value: Don't forget! You can still use Skyscanner for free without an account.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_DeleteSummary
data.value: We're really sorry to see you go.

data.name: ktxtAccounts_DeleteReasonLabel
data.comment: (s) - if this does not make sense to include plural in braces then it can just be removed and translated as singular "Reason"
